useCase.name: Share Work
useCase.description: Allow a member to share their work.

preconditions.precondition: Member is logged into the application.

useCase.trigger: Member selects to share their work.

mainSequence.step: UI manager displays the file share form.
Member views the file share form.
Member fills in work details and attaches the file.
Member adds file to the form.
Application displays the analysis result to the member.
Application copies the file to the "Moderation" directory.
Application sends transaction and file to the server.
Server notifies librarian of the work submission.
Application notifies member of work moderation wait.
